a22.l: select name from coretstructhdr where coretstructhdrid =:oldrecid
select caption from coretstructhdr where coretstructhdrid =:oldrecid
select dcselect from coretstructhdr where coretstructhdrid =:oldrecidcal
select sorderno from coretstructhdr where coretstructhdrid =:oldrecidcal
inner join axpdef_dc b on a.dcid =b.axpdef_dcid where a.coretstructhdrid =:oldrecidcal
select a1.ntransid, a1.axpdef_tstructid,a1.caption from axpdef_tstruct a1 order by a1.ntransid
select fldordno from tstruct_mst_details s where s.sourceid=:oldrecid
select cast(typename as varchar(20)) as typename from customtypes
select cast('NA' as varchar(20)) as typename
select cast(typename as varchar(20)) typename,datatype,width,dwidth from axp_customdatatype where isactive ='T'
select cast('NA' as varchar(20)) as typename ,datatype ,width,deci as dwidth from customtypes

name.a14: iif(name = stransid, name + { Should not be transid},{T})

a59.l: Name, will be created as column in DB table.

a22.l: Select case when lower(substr( :name ,1,1)) in ( 'a','b','c','d','e','f','g','h','i','j','k','l','m','n','o','p','q','r','s','t','u','v','w','x','y','z') then 'T' else 'F' end as

validchk.a14: iif(fcharcheck= {F},{ Fieldname should always start with character}, iif(validchk={F},{Special Characters are not allowed in Name},{T}))

namevalid.a14: iif(namevalid=1 | namevalid>1,name + { is a Keyword or function name.Please enter Different Name},{T})

a59.l: Caption will be displayed in the Form/Tstruct

a22.l: select cast( a1.caption||'('|| a1.name || ')' as varchar(100)) as dcname,A1.CTDC,A1.FIELD_MAXNUM,axpdef_dcid,a1.asgrid,a1.caption,a1.name
from axpdef_dc a1 where a1.stransid= :stransid and a1.asgrid='F'
select cast( a1.caption||'('|| a1.name || ')' as varchar(100)) as dcname,A1.CTDC,A1.FIELD_MAXNUM,axpdef_dcid,a1.asgrid,a1.caption,a1.name
from axpdef_dc a1 where a1.stransid= :stransid and a1.asgrid='T' and :customdatatype not in ('RadioGroup','CheckList')
select FIELD_MAXNUM from coretstructhdr where coretstructhdrid = :recid
select cast(dt as varchar(20)) as dt,ord from(
select datatype as dt,6 as ord from customtypes
select datatype as dt,7 as ord from axp_customdatatype
and :customdatatype is not null and ( :cdatatype is null or :cdatatype = 'NA' )
and :customdatatype is not null and ( :cdatatype is null or :cdatatype = 'NA' )

fdecimal.a14: iif(fdecimal < 7 ,{T},{Should not be greater than 6},iif(datawidth <fdecimal,{T},{Should not be greater than Data Width}))

Searchhide.a13: iif(customdatatype={Large Text} || customdatatype={Image} || customdatatype={Table} || customdatatype={Password} || customdatatype={Multi Select} || customdatatype={Rich Text}, {T},{F})

maskhide.a13: iif(customdatatype={DropDown} || customdatatype={Multi Select} || customdatatype={CheckList} || customdatatype={Check box} || customdatatype={RadioGroup} || customdatatype={Image} || customdatatype={Time} || customdatatype={Date} || customdatatype={Table}, {T},{F})

a22.l: select cast(moe as varchar(50)) as moe,sno from (
select modeofentry as moe,1 as sno from customtypes
select 'Select From List' as moe,5 as sno
select 'Select From Sql' as moe,6 as sno union
select 'Select From API' as moe,7 as sno) as a
select cast( caption || '-(' || ntransid || ')' as varchar(350)) as caption,ntransid as name from axpdef_tstruct order by caption

selectform.a14: iif(modeofentry={Select From Form} & isempty(selectform)={T}, { Field is Mandatory},{T})

a22.l: select cast( case when COALESCE(caption,'')='' then name else caption end ||'-('||name||')' as varchar(250)) as caption,name as fname from coretstructhdr where stransid = :fromtransid

selectflddl.a14: iif(modeofentry={Select From Form} & isempty(selectfield)={T}, { Field is Mandatory},{T})

a22.l: select tablename from axpdef_dc where name = (select dcname from coretstructhdr where stransid = :fromtransid and name = :selectfield ) and

def_list.a14: iif(modeofentry={Select From List} & isempty(def_list)={T} , { Field is Mandatory},{T})

a22.l: select case when COALESCE( :selectfield ,'')='' then ' ' else 'Select a1.'|| :tname || 'id,a1.'|| :selectfield ||' from ' || :tname ||' a1'|| ' order by a1.'||
select case when COALESCE( :selectfield ,'')='' then ' ' else 'Select a1.'|| :selectfield ||' from ' || :tname ||' a1'|| ' order by a1.'||
select case when :modeofentry != 'Select From Form' then '' end
select executeapidefid,execapidefname from executeapidef where APICategory='Drop Down'

apidefname.a14: iif(modeofentry={Select From API} & isempty(apidefname)={T}, { Field is Mandatory},{T})

apifieldname.a2: Map field Name from API Output

a22.l: select cast( caption||'-('||ntransid||')' as varchar(350)) as caption,ntransid as name from axpdef_tstruct order by caption
select '' as a where :modeofentry != 'Select From Sql'

sql_editor_test.a14: iif(modeofentry={Select From Sql} & isempty(sql_editor_test)={T}, {Field is Mandatory},{T})

a22.l: select cast(case when COALESCE(c.caption,'')='' then c.name else c.caption end||'-('||c.name||')' as varchar(250)) caption,c.name
select cast(case when COALESCE(c.caption,'')='' then c.name else c.caption end ||'-('||c.name||')' as varchar(100)) caption,c.name
select cast( caption||'-('||ntransid||')' as varchar(350)) as caption,ntransid as name from axpdef_tstruct order by caption
select cast(case when COALESCE(caption,'')='' then name else caption end ||'-('||name||')' as varchar(250)), name from vw_field_informations vfi where transid = :mastertstruct
select cast(case when COALESCE(caption,'')='' then name else caption end ||'-('||name||')' as varchar(250)), name from coretstructhdr where stransid = :mastertstruct

validsavenormalized_form.a14: iif((customdatatype={RadioGroup}|customdatatype={CheckList}|customdatatype={Multi Select}) & moe={Select From Form} & actionfld # {change} & savenormalized_form={T}, {, can't be set normalized sql for RadioGroup/CheckList},{T})

a59.l: iif(savenormalized={F} & oldsavenormalized= {T},{Sourcekey of field is changed from false to true, do yo want to continue?},{T})

validnormalized.a14: iif((customdatatype={RadioGroup}||customdatatype={CheckList}) & moe={Select From Sql} & savenormalized={T}, {, can't be set normalized sql for RadioGroup/CheckList},{T})

a59.l: iif(firstcolvalue # ptableid & modeofentry={Select From Sql} & savenormalized={T},{First Column should consists of tableid},{T})

a22.l: select COALESCE(1,0) as abc where lower(cast( :sql_editor_test as varchar(4000))) like '%dynamicfilter%'

checkdynamicfileter.a14: iif(modeofentry={Select From Sql} & combobox_sql = {F} & dynamicfiltercnt <1 ,{Dynamic Filter is manditory},{T})

firstcharmask.a2: No of first few characters to be displayed

validcharmask.a2: Characters to be displayed in Mask
validcharmask.a14: iif(masking = {Show few characters} & validcharmask = {0} ,{ should not be Empty ! }, {T})

maskroles.a2: Masked value Readable for the roles

a22.l: select groupname from AXUSERGROUPS ORDER BY groupname

separator.a14: iif((customdatatype={Check List} | customdatatype={Multi Select} ) & isempty(separator)={T}, { Field is Mandatory},{T})

frules.a13: iif(modeofentry={Select From Form},{Details:}+sql_editor_sqltextform,iif(modeofentry={AutoGenerate},{Details:}+prefix,iif(modeofentry={Select From Sql},{Details:}+sql_editor_sqltext,iif(modeofentry={Select From List},{Details:}+ def_list ,iif(modeofentry={Calculate},{Details:}+sql_editor_detail)))))+{ }+iif(isempty(exp_editor_expression)={F},{Expression:}+exp_editor_expression,{})+{ }+iif(isempty(exp_editor_validateexpression)={F},{Validate Expression:}+exp_editor_validateexpression,{})

umessage.l0: Sourcekey of field is changed from false to true, do yo want to continue?

exprset.l0: firesql({f1},{update coretstructhdr set sorderno=sorderno+1 , fldordno=fldordno+1 where sorderno >= :sorderno and name != :name and stransid=:stransid})
exprset.l1: firesql({f2},{update tstruct_mst_details set sordno=sordno+1 where sordno >= :sorderno and SOURCETYPE='Inputfield' and sourcename != :name and mastertransid=:stransid})

exprset.l1: firesql({f2},{update tstruct_mst_details set sordno=sordno+1 where sordno >= :sorderno and SOURCETYPE='Inputfield' and sourcename != :name and mastertransid=:stransid})
